text: Pippi Longstocking is a 1997-98 Canadian/German/Swedish children's animated TV series co-produced by Nelvana Limited, SK Films, TaurusFilm, and Trickopmany Filmproduktion GMBH and was broadcast on Teletoon. ==References== Category:1990s animated television series Category:1997 Canadian television series debuts Category:1998 Canadian television series endings
title: Pippi Longstocking (1997 TV series)
